house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1985 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 1 car detached garage and approximately 939 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room. Features include fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Prudential Crane Realty/North Prudential Crane Realty/North

residential_listing_-_feature_details.heating: Forced Air, Hot Water, Natural Gas

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener
